Testimonials

See what our customers have to say about us.

Smooth, efficient process – couldn't have done it without you!

 

I have been in my new home for four weeks now, and now have had time to breath and enjoy my beautiful new space – all thanks to Monica.

I am so appreciative of all she did to enable me to purchase under difficult circumstances, and could not have done this without her.

The entire process flowed smoothly and efficiently. Monica’s professionalism and knowledge is without doubt, exceptional. She took the time to research and didn’t once say “this situation is too hard.”

She kept reassuring me along the way that she would continue to work with me and find a way to purchase the home I so desperately wanted. Monica’s expertise in this field is without fault, and I greatly valued the ongoing communication to keep me informed of where we were at.

I have no hesitation in recommending Monica and the Accelerate Group, and have already done so to many friends, family and colleagues.

Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you in my next venture.

– Heather

Helped me achieve a significant goal and dream

 

David, thank you for your exceptional service as always. You go above and beyond, and in doing so have helped me achieve a significant goal and dream in my life. For that I will remember you forever, in helping me to reach the next phase in my business life. I will be sure to promote and refer you and your business always.

– Chris

So much joy and so much to look forward to!

 

Thank you so much Mon, you have given us so much joy and so much to look forward to.

Cheers again from the bottom of our hearts.

– Joel, Bri and Kobi

Reliable, educational – worth their weight in gold!

 

After being out of the property market and not having bought property for over twenty years, I needed someone who I could rely on.

Working with Monica from Accelerate made this process stress free.

The rate she negotiated with my bank was great, however it was the education I gained along the way that is worth its weight in gold. I understood the process from beginning to end, and Monica did not leave a stone unturned.

Many thanks to Monica and her team at Accelerate.

– Craig
